document.masterDocTitle: Revision in part of the genus Nebrioporus Régimbart, 1906, with emphasis on the N. laeviventris-group (Coleoptera: Dytiscidae)

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Potamonectes variegatus (Aubé)
; J.
Balfour-Browne (1944a: 350)
(synonymy of
suavis Sharp
);
Zaitzev (1953: 215)
.

Deronectes variegatus var. infuscatus Sahlberg (1913: 42)
(orig. descr.);
Biström (1987: 35)
.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type locality.
D . suavis
: Greece > Mt. Parnassus;
D . variegatus var. infuscatus
: Turkey > Smyrne> Jamanal Dagh.

Type material.
Deronectes suavis
:
Lectotype ♂ ( BMNH ), here designated "type [ BMNH red bordered, circular label] \ Mt. Parnassus [ Sharp hw.] \ Sharp Coll. 1905-313 \ type 258 ♂ [ Sharp hw.] \ Graecia n.sp. [ Sharp hw.] \ Deronectes suavis n. sp. [ Sharp hw.]" plus BMNH circular, blue bordered " Lectotype " label, added by me and my red designation label
.
Paralectotype 1 ♀ ( BMNH ) with BMNH circular, yellow bordered " Paratype " label, and same indications of lectotype , except for "Graecia [Sharp hw.]" instead of "Graecia n.sp. " plus BMNH circular, light-blue bordered " Paralectotype " label, added by me and my red designation label
.

Deronectes variegatus var. infuscatus
: Syntypes (DABUH) not seen.

, A. G. H. Alston. , B. M. 1935-431 ( 1 ex. BMNH )
.

.

, leg. V. Gueorguiev , Brit. Mus. 1964-151 ( 4 exs. BMNH )
;

MNHN , HNHM ); Rhodos, 24.VI.–4.VII.1958 , Palm, ZML 1998 155 ( 5 exs. MZLU ); Rhodos S., 300 m , W Nano, 19.VI.1933 ( 1 ex. MNHN ); Peloponnese , rd. Description. This subspecies is not morphologically different from
N . stearinus stearinus
, except for the punctuation on the sternites, as described in the key. TL 4.7–6.0 mm; MW 2.4–2.9 mm . The within population variability is the same as for the nominal subspecies except that there are no known almost completely black examples, like some
N. stearinus stearinus
from Iran .
